Name: Shape Shooter
About the game: Roguelike Experience Shape Shooter provides you with an action-packed, colorful, and hectic roguelike experience. Survive increasingly difficult random generated stages and collect relics, weapons, and active items to help you on your way. Collect Items to Get Stronger Buy items with the gold you've collected to get stronger and a better chance of fighting increasingly difficult enemies and stages. Complete Missions to Unlock New Items and Skins! Unlock new items for future runs by completing missions. Delve into even more challenging missions to unlock unique skins. Key Features Every Stage Is unique Beautiful colors Lots of different items: Relics, Weapons, Active Items, Pickups, etc. Infinite replay value Compare your best score in the Leaderboard Various enemies Complete missions to unlock new items and skins! Easy to learn, hard to master Track you stats and best scores Great soundtracks Inspired By Great Games Like Risk Of Rain 2, Enter the Gungeon, Slay the Spire
